mapper.select:
select b.STCD,b.STNM,a.FWL,a.FWL79,a.ZCWL from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=2 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join ST_RSVR_R1 r on r.stcd=b.stcd left join ST_RSV_Alarm a on b.STCD=a.STCD
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%'
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and b.STGR in (${STGR})
and r.level in (${LEVEL})
